text:
@WhiteHouse So... now Trump was just joking, being sarcastic, about injecting disinfectant or UV?
In a classic "blame-the-messenger" move, GOP accuses the media for taking 45 out of context!
Millions heard the 2hr context.
Hyper-spin won't work, GOP!
#GOPGenocide
#DJT
https://t.co/xf3sRtqMrR
